Admissions Management Tools

Your comprehensive admissions processing and management platform provides complete control over your admissions lifecycle. This powerful suite includes:

Automated application processing and routing Click to configure routing rules and auto-assignment
Interview scheduling and calendar management Schedule interviews, manage calendars, and track attendance
Decision tracking and automated notifications Manage admitted applicants through enrollment confirmation and waitlist workflows
Enrollment management and waitlist handling Track acceptance of offers, declines, and deferrals. Manage waitlists with ranking and auto-promotion
Custom evaluation criteria and scoring Build flexible evaluation rubrics with multi-reviewer scoring and automated calculations
Document verification and compliance checks Verify required documents, track compliance status, and maintain comprehensive audit trails
Integration with student information systems Secure data exchange, export admitted students, sync status updates, and handle batch transfers
Reporting and analytics dashboard Real-time metrics, demographic analysis, funnel tracking, and comprehensive reporting tools
